metadata.Title: CVE-2014-9621 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - low.
metadata.Description:
The ELF parser in file 5.16 through 5.21 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service via a long string.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2014-9621` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

file - 1:5.22+15-2ubuntu1
libmagic1 - 1:5.22+15-2ubuntu1
python-magic - 1:5.22+15-2ubuntu1
python3-magic - 1:5.22+15-2ubuntu1
No subscription required

notes.Note: mdeslaur> readelf.c not used in php5 introduced by fix for CVE-2014-9620

criterions.comment: file package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1:5.22+15-2ubuntu1').
